transcript: I am a very compassionate person and I'm offended that you imply that I'm not. Of course I'm compassionate. Look, I work in the DMV. What do you think I am? Go wait in line two way.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I am a very compassionate person, and I'm offended that you imply that I'm not.  Of course, I'm compassionate.  Look, I work in the D.M.V..  What do you think I am?  Go wait in line two A.
